definition: (chemistry) the tendency of an atom or radical to attract electrons in the formation of an ionic bond
details:
noun
- (chemistry) the tendency of an atom or radical to attract electrons in the formation of an ionic bond
= synonyms: electronegativity
- an amount less than zero
= synonyms: negativeness
- characterized by habitual skepticism and a disagreeable tendency to deny or oppose or resist suggestions or commands
= synonyms: negativeness, negativism
- the character of the negative electric pole
= synonyms: negativeness
